name: 2022 14th International Conference on Education Technology and Computers
content: Conference Proceedings: All papers will be strictly double blind reviewed by the program committee and reviewers, and accepted papers of ICETC 2022 after registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9777-3), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
